TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z t ɛ l ɚ æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ s n ʌ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b æ ɡ w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n ɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ t ɔːɹ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k iː d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ ɡ oʊ m iː t ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
